# VisionError.invalidArgument(_:)

**Case**

An error that indicates a request has an invalid value.

## Declaration

```swift
case invalidArgument(String)
```

## Getting the invalid error

- **VisionError.invalidFormat(_:)**: An error that indicates a request has data that’s formatted incorrectly.
- **VisionError.invalidImage(_:)**: An error that indicates the input image is invalid.
- **VisionError.invalidModel(_:)**: An error that indicates the Core ML model isn’t compatible with the request.
- **VisionError.invalidOperation(_:)**: An error that indicates an app requests an unsupported operation.
